text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: This is called the “paddock”. Horse girls appear before the race and show off to their fans!

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Pay attention! In the paddock, you can check various factors before you start the race.

text_block_list.name: Chairwoman Akikawa
text_block_list.text: As for more information… Tazuna! Give the Trainer an explanation!
